name: TreatmentSideEffects
title: Treatment Side Effects
description: DO NOT USE: This value set was inadvertently published and does not make sense in the context exchange standards
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing an observation of problematic side effects experienced after starting a medication.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a/an identification of any problematic side effects the person reports experiencing after starting a medication (e.g., constipation, loss of sexual interest, exquisite sensitivity to pain, slowed thinking, nausea, drowsiness, weight gain, weight loss, itchiness, confusion, others) and the suspected causative agent (opioids, angiolytics, psychotropics, antidepressents, etc).),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes LOINC codes for Treatment Side Effects .),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Treatment Side Effects .)

contains.display: History of Adverse drug reaction Narrative
Medication or other side effects associated with HIV treatment
Severity of side effect to HIV treatment
I have unpleasant side effects from my medication [PhenX]
I am bothered by side effects of treatment in the past 7 days [FACIT]
Compared to what you expected, how do you rate the side effects of treatment so far [FACIT]
The side effects are causing me discomfort [PsoSat]
